title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with all valid input data including required fields and valid email format.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill in all required fields with valid data (e.g., username, email, password, role selection).
Submit the registration form.
Verify that the registration is successful and user is redirected to appropriate dashboard or login.

title: User Registration Input Validation
description: Verify that input validations work properly for user registration form including empty fields, invalid email format, and password minimum length.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Attempt registration with empty required fields.
Verify appropriate error messages for missing required fields.
Enter invalid email formats and weak passwords.
Verify validation errors for email format and password strength.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify successful login with valid username/email and password combination for different user roles (buyer, seller, admin).

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify user is logged in and redirected to role-based dashboard.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid username/email or password and appropriate error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input invalid username/email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login fails with appropriate error message.

title: Browse Car Catalog with Search and Filtering
description: Verify that users can search and filter cars by various attributes such as brand, price, year, and type, and results reflect search criteria.

steps.description: Navigate to the car catalog page.
Use search box to enter keywords for car model or brand.
Verify that search results include matching vehicles.
Apply multiple filters (e.g., price range, year, color).
Verify that filtered results meet all selected filter criteria.

title: Car Detail Page Displays Complete Information
description: Verify that detailed vehicle page shows all relevant specifications, pricing, photos, seller info, and contact options.

steps.description: Open a vehicle detail page from the catalog.
Verify display of vehicle specifications, price, photos gallery, seller/showroom data, and contact buttons.

title: Add and Remove Cars from Wishlist
description: Verify that authenticated users can add cars to wishlist, view wishlist, and remove cars from it.

steps.description: Login as a buyer.
Navigate to a vehicle detail page and add car to wishlist.
Verify car is added to wishlist.
Navigate to wishlist page.
Verify the added car appears in wishlist.
Remove car from wishlist.
Verify car is removed successfully.

title: Car Comparison Tool Functionality
description: Verify user can select multiple cars and compare their detailed specifications side by side.

steps.description: Navigate to car catalog.
Select two or more vehicles to compare.
Open comparison page or modal.
Verify specifications of selected cars are displayed side by side accurately.

title: Credit Simulation with EMI Calculation
description: Verify users can input criteria (car price, down payment, interest rate, tenure) and receive accurate EMI and budget recommendations.

steps.description: Navigate to credit simulation page.
Input car price, down payment, interest rate, and loan tenure.
Submit simulation.
Verify EMI calculation outputs and suggested car budget recommendations are correct.

title: Transaction Processing and Invoice Generation
description: Verify end-to-end purchase flow including selecting car, confirming purchase, payment validation, and generation of invoice.

steps.description: Login as buyer.
Select a car and proceed to purchase.
Confirm purchase details and make payment.
Verify payment processing is successful and invoice is generated and accessible.

title: Transaction Failure Handling
description: Verify that transaction fails gracefully if payment is declined and user is notified with error messages.

steps.description: Simulate payment decline scenario during transaction.
Verify transaction is not completed and user receives clear error notification.

title: Test Drive Booking Workflow
description: Verify users can submit test drive requests, admins can approve or deny, and notifications are sent accordingly.

steps.description: Login as user and submit a test drive booking request with desired date/time.
Verify request is stored and user receives confirmation of submission.
Login as admin and view pending test drive requests.
Approve or deny a test drive request.
Verify user receives notification about approval or denial.

title: Trade-In Evaluation and Negotiation Flow
description: Verify users can submit trade-in vehicle info with photos, receive price estimation, negotiate, schedule survey, and finalize contract.

steps.description: Login as user and submit trade-in vehicle info including photo uploads.
Verify price estimation is received.
Engage in negotiation process within system.
Verify negotiation records and status updates.
Schedule survey appointment after agreed terms.
Finalize trade-in with contract generation.
Verify contract is accessible and trade-in process is marked complete.

title: AI Chatbot Response and Escalation
description: Verify AI assistant chatbot answers common queries and escalates complex issues to human operators seamlessly.

steps.description: Open chat interface and ask a common question.
Verify chatbot provides an accurate automated response.
Ask a question beyond AI capability to trigger escalation.
Verify chat is escalated and human operator joins the conversation.

title: Advertisement Life Cycle Management
description: Verify users can create advertisements with photo uploads, admins moderate and approve ads, payments can be processed for promotions, and ads are displayed appropriately.

steps.description: Login as user and create a new advertisement including uploading photos.
Verify ad is submitted and pending moderation.
Login as admin and review pending advertisements.
Approve or reject advertisement.
Verify user receives notification of moderation status.
Process payment for ad promotion if approved.
Verify ad appears in promoted section after payment confirmation.

title: Admin Dashboard User Management
description: Verify admins can view, edit, deactivate, and assign roles to users within the admin dashboard.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to user management section.
View list of registered users.
Edit user information and change roles.
Deactivate a user account.
Verify changes are saved and reflected correctly in the system.

title: Executive Dashboard KPI and Reporting
description: Verify showroom owners can access and view real-time KPIs, detailed analytics, financial reports, and strategic metrics.

steps.description: Login as showroom owner and navigate to executive dashboard.
Verify visibility of key performance indicators and trend charts.
Generate and export financial and strategic reports.
Verify reports have accurate data and correct export format.

title: Real-Time Messaging Between Users and Dealers
description: Verify chat system functionality including sending, receiving messages in real-time between buyers, sellers, and admins with message status indicators.

steps.description: Login as buyer and open chat with a seller.
Send a message.
Verify message appears instantly on sender and receiver ends with read/delivered status.
Receive reply message from seller.
Verify real-time reception and correct display of message.

title: Payment System Validation and Security Compliance
description: Verify that the payment processing system validates payment inputs, handles payment gateways securely, and complies with PCI DSS standards.

steps.description: Initiate payment with valid card details.
Verify successful payment transaction and compliance labels in logs.
Attempt payment with invalid or expired card.
Verify payment is rejected with secure error handling.

title: System Administration Security and Backup Operations
description: Verify that system admin functionalities including user rights management, security settings, backup scheduling, and system health monitoring operate correctly.

steps.description: Login as system admin and navigate to user rights management.
Modify user permissions and validate access changes.
Verify security policies are enforced accordingly.
Trigger system backup and monitor process.
Verify backup completes successfully and backup logs are accurate.
Review system monitoring dashboard.
Verify all performance and security sensors report correct system health.

title: Cross-Device UI Compatibility
description: Verify that all major user interfaces render and function correctly on multiple device types and screen sizes including desktop, tablet, and mobile.

steps.description: Access the platform on desktop browser.
Verify UI layout is correct and all features accessible.
Access platform on tablet and mobile device browsers.
Verify UI adapts properly with no loss in functionality or usability.

title: Content Management System Functionality
description: Verify that authorized users can create, edit, publish, and delete articles and customer reviews within the CMS.

steps.description: Login as content manager.
Create a new article with text and images.
Verify article is published and visible in the content list.
Edit existing article content and save changes.
Verify updates are saved and reflected in published content.
Delete an article and confirm removal.
Verify article is no longer accessible.
